branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
Graminae or Poaceae, the grass family

sentences.english: Yuchang Zou has been engaged in cosmetic surgery for 19 years after his clinical graduation.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀本科畢業，從事美容外科工作19年。

sentences.english: It also has a very good undergraduate program.
sentences.chinese: 這兒也有非常好的本科課程。

sentences.english: And then I started taking more classes in undergrad Education classes.
sentences.chinese: 然後我便開始多上本科的教育方面的課程。

sentences.english: This is among the best-paid professions for people with just a college degree.
sentences.chinese: 這是隻有本科學位的畢業生中收入最高的職業之一。

sentences.english: The application of cereal straw increased the soil water contents.
sentences.chinese: 施用禾本科秸杆能增加土壤的水分含量。

sentences.english: He hadn't gotten his undergrad yet.
Most grass embryos have a flap-like structure known as the epiblast .
sentences.chinese: 大多數禾本科胚有一片瓣狀結構通常稱爲外胚葉。

sentences.english: Syracuse University, Computer Science, M. Sc.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學，計算機系，本科。

sentences.english: Before Wang's lecture, to sang songs for a whole night with my undergraduate students.
sentences.chinese: 聽王老師講座前一天，跟本科生去唱了一晚的歌兒。

sentences.english: Well, undergraduate? I think here, there is enough housing if people want it.
sentences.chinese: 本科生？我覺得只要有學生想住，肯定有房間。

sentences.english: Currently there are nearly 6678 undergraduates from all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 學院面向全國招生，現有在校本科生6678人。

sentences.english: The text can be used at the advanced undergraduate and graduate level.
sentences.chinese: 文本就可以被用在高年級本科生和研究生的水平。

sentences.english: For example, Harvard College is the undergraduate part of Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 例如，哈佛學院就是哈佛大學的本科部分。

sentences.english: For one-semester, undergraduate level courses in Organizational Behavior.
sentences.chinese: 適用於本科水平的組織行爲學一學期制課程。

sentences.english: Annual broadleaf and grass weeds are major problems .
sentences.chinese: 主要問題是一年生闊葉雜草和禾本科雜草。

sentences.english: I was majored in Administrative Management during my undergraduate corse .
sentences.chinese: 我的專業是行政管理本科課程期間。
